p: Figure 5 shows determination of the MIC of tar on some bacterial and fungal sub-gingival plaque samples. Test was done on Mueller Hinton agar plates which were incubated at 37Â°C for 5 days. The test was done with the original tar, then dilution 1/10, 1/100 and 1/1000; note inhibition zones under and around colonies). Negative control is a disk impregnated in sterile distilled water and positive control disks were imipenem (bacteria) and amphotoricin B (fungi).
